name: World.frameRate
content:
The number of times per second the screen is refreshed.

The number of times per second the screen is refreshed is also the speed of `draw()` loop. frameRate is a variable that you do not need to declare. You can both read the value of frameRate and assign a new value to frameRate.

The default rate of 30 frames per second and values are limited to between 1 and 60.

examples.description: Accelerate a square across the screen.

return_value: The number of times per second the screen is refreshed.
short_description: The number of times per second the screen is refreshed.
